729499f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Park Avenue
729499f-a.text:
2022-2024 Richmond Terrace, south side, west from Park Avenue to Richmond Avenue. The frame building with the colonnade is the Old St. James Hotel, where Aaron Burr, Vice President of the United States under Jefferson, died in 1836.

July 29, 1929.
P.L. Sperr
729499f-a.folder: Richmond Terrace & Park Avenue, Staten Island, NY
